name: Tellers Summary Report
query:
SELECT
`tabUser`.full_name as "Teller Name::200",
DATE(`tabTransactions Details`.posting_date) as Date,
SUM(`tabTransactions Details`.outflow) as "OUTFLOW:Currency:150",
SUM(`tabTransactions Details`.inflow) as "INFLOW:Currency:150"
FROM
`tabTransactions Details`, `tabAgents`, `tabUser`
WHERE
`tabTransactions Details`.user_id = `tabAgents`.agent_user
AND
`tabAgents`.agent_user = `tabUser`.email
GROUP BY
`tabTransactions Details`.user_id, Date
